column4: BlackRock voted to replace Tesla's Musk with independent chairman
column5: NEW YORK Funds run by BlackRock Inc voted in favor of a recent shareholder proposal that would have required Tesla Inc to replace Elon Musk with an independent chairman.

column4: UPDATE 1-BlackRock voted to replace Tesla's Musk with independent chairman
column5: NEW YORK  Aug 30 Funds run by BlackRock Inc voted in favor of a recent shareholder proposal that would have required Tesla Inc to replace Elon Musk with an independent chairman.

column4: As Tesla shares fall  Amazon takes over as most shorted U.S. stock
column5: NEW YORK With Tesla Inc's  shares briefly dipping below the $300 level on Thursday  the electric carmaker ceded its seat as the most shorted U.S. stock to Amazon.com Inc   according to data from financial technology and analytics firm S3 Partners.

column4: Qualcomm beats bid to block it from enforcing potential import ban
column5: Qualcomm Inc has beat back an attempt by consumers in a proposed antitrust class action to bar it from enforcing a ban on certain iPhone imports  should it win such a ban in its long-running intellectual property battle with Apple Inc.
